undergraduate.degree: Bachelor of Science in Engineering and Computer Science

earlyLife.childhood: Person was raised in a major city within the United States. Their mother had them during her teenage years, and their father ran a local business. The mother remarried an immigrant, who later adopted Person.
earlyLife.interests: From a young age, Person showed an interest in technology and inventing, even participating in science fairs with innovative projects.

earlyCareer.description: Person began their career working on Wall Street, holding various positions at multiple firms.

founding.description: Person founded a major online company originally as a bookstore, which expanded to a multi-product platform, eventually becoming a global leader in e-commerce.

milestones.event: Launch of a major web services platform.
Became the most valuable retailer in the nation.

blueOrigin.description: Founded in 2000, this is a private aerospace company focused on affordable space travel.

acquisition.description: Acquired a major newspaper, revitalizing it with digital innovations.

bezosExpedition.description: A personal investment firm invested in various successful startups.

philanthropy.description: Person has pledged significant amounts to charitable causes, particularly in education and housing.

notableInitiatives.name: Day One Fund
notableInitiatives.description: Supports organizations that assist homeless families.

notableInitiatives.name: Earth Fund
notableInitiatives.description: Initiative to combat climate change with substantial funding.

netWorth.ranking: One of the richest people in the world
